title: The Framework
subtitle: From Audit to Amplify. Our process.

steps.title: AUDIT
steps.description: First, we analyze the current state of your business. What's missing? What needs to be fixed?

steps.title: ARCHITECT
steps.description: This is where we design the solution. The blueprint from Brand Identity to Technical System.

steps.title: ACTIVATE
steps.description: Start your social presence. Time to launch what we've beautifully planned.

steps.title: AUTOMATE
steps.description: Technology to make work easier. Systems that save your time via Chatbots and n8n Workflows.

steps.title: AMPLIFY
steps.description: Let's take the Brand everywhere. High-voltage Ads and Campaigns.
